 2001-04872001-03-290,  ,  ,  ,  FAIT
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign a CONVENTION between Canada and ECUADOR for the AVOIDANCE OF DOUBLE TAXATION and the PREVENTION of FISCAL EVASION with respect to TAXES ON INCOME, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers enabling other representatives to sign the Convention for Canada.
